backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing tasks, related files, components, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of major frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base/theme configuration defining light and dark mode design tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up metadata and loading the React application root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders the LandingPage.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: React component displaying address, phone numbers, email, and emergency info using shared contact constants.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing hospital info, contact links, location, and attribution using centralized contact constants.
frontend/src/components/SpecialtiesSecti: Renders a grid of medical specialties with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/constants/hospitalContact.t: Exports centralized hospital contact details including phones, email, address, and branding text.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance based on authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing login, stored identities, and status states. Wraps AuthClient creation and exposes login and clear functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future React Query hooks; currently exports nothing.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS layers and a custom medical-themed OKLCH color system, plus base styles, typography, and accessibility rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the hospital landing page with hero, contact CTAs, and section components using hospital contact constants and UI components.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins for the site's design system.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, and notes for updating the KVR Hospital website, including contact-number correction tasks.
